metadata.title: Neat Solutions for Pets Pillow Pet Lounge, Polycord with Piped Edge, 30-Inch by 40-Inch, Tapioca
features: Super supportive construction; Easily removable cover with large zipper; Water-resistant inner pad for easy accident clean-up
Easy to replace covers; Liquid resistant inner pad covers; Special stitching holds inner pad fill in place, helps resist clumping during pet activity
Machine wash separately in cold water, gentle cycle; Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed; Tumble dry on low heat; Do not iron; Reshape as needed
description: Neat Solutions for Pets Pillow Lounge - Polycord with Piped Edge - 30 Inch x 40 Inch - Tapioca color.
